1.text: How something like this could have happened? There must be some info in the archive

3.text: That can't be... The archive must have been corrupted just recently, it can't be that incomplete. That's why you cannot stand up without running.

4.text: ... or can the archive be that incomplete?

5.text: Flyw8t! In the next floor there is a WorkStation, there you con overdrive your limits using new chips

6.text: Once you are inside it, put the passive chips in your systems to go beyond your own capabilities

7.text: Good luck at the component Factory, you are going to need it...
